item.title: The Journey to Achieve 1000x TPS for a Real-World Core Banking Application on TiDB
item.description: This session was presented on Percona Community Live Online June 21-23, 2022. Check out the full schedule here. Performance tuning is complicated, especially with a distributed database like TiDB. It becomes even more challenging when the whole system is running on arm64-based servers. Watch Video Here Link: https://youtu.be/jSrK0x1MmYk Transcript
